example.eg: The judge granted the plaintiff the right to see the documents.
example.egtrans: 法官授权原告查看文件。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 授予...给, 准予某人某物, 立约转让

example.eg: The genie granted him a wish.
example.egtrans: 妖怪答应满足他一个愿望。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 答应满足, 同意满足, 赋予, 赐予

example.eg: The graduate student received a grant to finish her thesis.
example.egtrans: 该研究生获得了一笔补助以完成论文。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 拨款, 补助金, 助学金

example.eg: The grant of land from my father to my brother has been completed.
example.egtrans: 我爸给我哥的土地转让已完成。

example.eg: The judge's grant was greeted with applause by the plaintiff.
example.egtrans: 法官予以批准，原告鼓掌欢迎。

example.eg: I grant that he sounded genuine, but I still don't believe what he says.
Many communities use federal block grants to improve services.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （联邦政府发给州或地方的）固定拨款

example.eg: Cinderella's fairy godmother granted her wish to go to the royal ball.
Picasso granted Quinn's wish to photograph the artist at work.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 接受经济援助的，受补助的
由中央政府出资的，中央政府拨款的
